sentence: it is worth holding out for the King bed room because the room is so spacious it really makes the stay feel luxurious
We stayed in a spacious 1 bedroom cottage which was quiet and a short walk from the main hotel
Get the cheese and fruit basket with a bottle of cabernet sauvignon delivered to your room prior to arrival to ease into your new digs and not rush to dinner after a long drive
nice place comfort room good restaurants
Very friendly and helpful staff nice rooms and plenty of activities
So stay in the lodge make sure you get a new room
The renovations to the rooms look good
We have enjoyed our stay here with great rooms and excellent service from reception desk to restaurants

nice indoor pool good food very clean hotel nice staff close to Yosemite park in winter is the best place to be with family a lot of activities and good place to stay a lot of rooms and always friendly

I would say that the downsides are the facilities closing pretty early and the bathroom near the lobby was not very clean

there are Kuerigs in the rooms for coffee or tea
One more trip to the front desk and she gave me a better room
